description.p1: I'm Ali Seyedi , a front-end developer with one year of experience. I have a passion for web and mobile development and am always eager to learn new things.
description.p2: So far, I've been improving my coding and programming skills by watching YouTube videos, reading documents, articles, and books.
description.p3: I've also tried to familiarize myself with the concepts and challenges of the front-end world by creating practice projects, some of which you can see in the projects section. If you have educational resources or work that you think would be useful for me, please feel free to share them with me.
description.p4: Currently, I'm looking for new opportunities to gain more experience and face new challenges. I have worked with JavaScript and TypeScript and have experience with popular libraries like React and the Next.js framework. You can see a complete list of my skills in the skills section.
